collections::​sequential_iterator
uvm_object
patterns::​ .​iterator​#(T)
collections::​ .​sequential_iterator​#(type T=uvm_object)

A generic iterator class for iterating over collection classes, uvm_queue, built-in queue and built-in dynamic arrays.

Iterator Interface
item
virtual function T item()

Returns the iterator's current enumeration value.

iter
virtual function iterator iter()

Returns an <iterator> over the items of an <iterable>.

next
virtual function iterator next()

Progresses the iterator instance to the next enumeration value and returns it.
